description: Chihiro is left homeless with supposedly no relatives after his mom died.
title: Shounen Maid

description: In a world where humanity lives within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans.
title: Attack on Titan

description: Five years after his victory over Piccolo Jr., Son Goku now lives a peaceful life.
title: Dragon Ball Z

description: In Taisho-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado is a kind-hearted boy who sells charcoal for a living.
title: Kimetsu no Yaiba

description: Yuji Itadori is a high school student with exceptional physical abilities.
title: Jujutsu Kaisen (TV)
